website_summaries.verdict: Low priced bath mat in an easy-to-see deep-blue color.
pros: Larger size than average bath mat, which ensures full coverage and reduces the possibility of slipping
Makes use of more than 200 suction cups and 174 drainage holes to ensure the mat will dry quickly after use
cons: Made only for smooth and non-textured bath tubs

customer_reviews.title: Gross smell after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t ignore the reviews about a bad smell. I’ve had it 2 months. Initially it smelled kind of plastic-y, but over the last 3 weeks or so, there has been a smell in the bathroom like a cross between onions and body odor. I practically sterilized the bathroom, including taking the guts of the ceiling fan down and cleaning it. Finally figured out it was the mat. I use “ Clean Shower “ spray after showers, so maybe that caused a reaction. No matter the reason, that mat is gone. I don’t even want to try to wash it in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Always seeking value

customer_reviews.title: Traps dirt and hair easily, yellows quickly. [Color: Clear]
customer_reviews.text: Love how long it is, but am noticing that it does trap filth and soap scum under it very easily, and I need to wash it with a sponge and dish soap about once a week. Otherwise it's wonderful! Have to edit this post, unfortunately from 4⭐ to 3⭐. Still like the product- though I need to clean it sometimes more than 2x a week. After about 2 weeks of use, the mat (I ordered clear) started to yellow, despite my constant cleaning. I'm not sure if this would be the case with the colored mats. I don't use any products (bath or cleaning) that would cause such staining, so I'm not sure what's going on.
customer_reviews.author: Cory M.

customer_reviews.title: STINKS SO BAD!
customer_reviews.text: The length is nice, but that's the only positive thing going for it. This thing really stinks. I mean it stinks so bad that I can't keep it in the bathtub without wanting to vomit. It made the whole bathroom and bedroom stink. That's how strong the odor it as. I tried letting it air our for a couple days outside, washing it... doesn't matter. It just makes everyone nauseous. On top of that, I can't get the mat to stop slipping. I followed the instructions on how to apply it, but once you step on it, it just moves and ripples like loose carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons...
customer_reviews.text: It's long! It doesn't stick well though to a clean bathtub and it doesn't stay clear. I've only had it for a few months and it's already dis-colored a yellowish orange color. I hang it up to dry, clean it, clean the bathtub... It's not pretty. It use to be super clear. Soft and squishy though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Matt for my mother and was very disappointed. The matt floats. No suction to the tub no matter what we try. Will not stick to the tub or any other surface. This matt is a safety hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for comfort but am loving its color and contribution to the decor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bath runner for comfort but I love the color, such a peaceful blue hue. It adds a touch of elegance and serenity to my bathroom decor, not to mention comfort. It takes a bit of work to keep it pristine... soap scum takes some scrubbing but I still would recommend this product for purchase. Good product, Good Price!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: DON’T RECOMMEND !
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product since August & I recently had to throw it out. It started accumulating this DISGUSTING rotting smell that took over the entire bathroom. Nothing I did to clean & scrub it, worked. The smell was BEYOND disgusting. I thought it was the plumbing but it wasn’t. So if you are already having this issue just throw it out & watch your bathroom go back to smelling normal & clean. I will NOT be buying this product ever again. It was good for the first few months then that rotting smell started. (yes! I cleaned my tub weekly & the smell still continued until I threw it out). Don’t recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Naty

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell
customer_reviews.text: Good mat but really horrible smell. I tried soaking in soap and water and that doesn't work. I soaked it in vinegar and water in the tub over night and that seemed to help a lot. I took a star off for the horrible smell, it was making me sick, literally. If I hadn't figured out to use vinegar it would be in the trash. Seems to stick to the tub ok, it's the first bath mat I've ever owned, I got it for my daughter's bath time, tub was too slippery without one. Seems to help with that. Cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great, smells really bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, feels very durable, easy to install and the suction is great but it smells worse than awful. I tried spraying it with a bathroom cleaner several times a day. A month later it still smells. Update: I was contacted by the company and issued a full refund, no need to return the mat. I really appreciate that they stand behind their policy of customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tub liner. It covers nearly the entire standard tub surface, the many suction cups keep it in place, easy to clean and definitely provides a great deal of full area safety all for a very good price. We purchased the purple colored one and it goes great with our color scheme in our bathroom. I would highly recommend this tub liner to anyone and everyone. One of my very few 5 Star reviewed products. A definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy and Babs

customer_reviews.title: Smell takes a while to go away
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty pink. I've does have a strong chemical smell that has take some weeks to finally evaporate. After reading reviews about mold growth, I do pick mine up after use and hang vertical on the shower wall to let it drain adequately. I have thrown it in the wash four times now (which I do with all my bath mats) and it was held up great on regular cycle. Giving it 4 stars because of the smell otherwise very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smell! I'm sure it will off gas and dissipate after a while, but it was so bad even after I washed it with water and soap, I had to put it in the garage. I don't know how long the smell will last. It is well made. I got the black one. I will not buy another one. I should not have bought this one. I didn't read all the reviews. If it had less stars I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Firecracker

customer_reviews.title: Best bath mat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through quite a few tub mats since having kids & this is the all time winner! No slipping, no sliding, & it stays put no matter if it’s a bath or shower. And you don’t have to take it up to dry every single time. The blue is pretty & helps hide my 60’s awkward yellowish tub. It is pretty pungent the first few days. I let a hot shower run on it for a few minutes for the first 3 days & it helped. Then after a few baths the smell was completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Greengal

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This would be an amazing mat, but it smells so bad! I expected it to have that familiar plastic smell that many shower mats and curtains have, but it was worse. The smell is not dissipating. I scrubbed it, soaked it and hung it out side. It smells like chemicals and burnt rubber. I’m just going to throw it out. *** on a side note, I also purchased the blue mat. It doesn’t smell nearly as bad. I like that one. That’s why I gave it 3 instead of 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the size!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace 2 side by side mats we were using to cover the whole tub that always got folded up on each other creating a hazard. This one long mat covers the entire tub and stays put (as long as you follow the instructions, wet tub first and press down firmly before standing on it) every time. We pull it up to let the underneath dry out between showers and have not had any signs of discoloration or mold. Great upgrade for us!
customer_reviews.author: Kandlelitangel

customer_reviews.title: I love this bath mat and it's so cheap to buy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bath mat. Very comfy on the feet and stretches the whole tub. I used my last one for three years before the sticky circles on the bottom collected to much scum to get clean so I just bought two more new ones. The price you cannot beat for such a great mat in the tub that holds up for years with simple cleaning when you clean your tub.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Works...
customer_reviews.text: After my elderly dad fell in my bathtub, knew a mat was needed. This has worked perfectly...just wish that debris didn't collect underneath it (rather unsightly, and I have a cleaning lady that cleans it even!) So, mat works, but being clear-you see debris. ETA: I now throw it in washing machine regularly, but clear color has morphed to an unsightly pale tan color (white tub). Always looks dirty. However, has bumps on surface which I believe help my elderly dad stay on his feet. Will remove when no longer needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because I have a very elderly mother who is very prone to falling and this extra long non-slip bathtub mat is perfect for her bathtub. She uses a chair to shower and it doesn't move at all with this mat. This mat also works very well for the rest of the family. I love the holes it has because it won't get moldy like others do because it allows the water to drain. Great buy, great price and I definitely recommend this mat for everyone, young and old.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Rafuls

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying a variety of mats for my very old tub/shower for a while now in an attempt to find the right one. This one is great compared to all the others. It is a perfect size, stays put, is very thin and most importantly helps prevent slipping. I would absolutely recommend this mat for an old tub, especially if you need to cover up some stains or ground in dirt particles on the bottom of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bath mat!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this bath mat so far! I haven't had it long enough to see how it holds up in the wash machine yet but it's exactly what I was looking for. Previous bath mats trapped moisture and germs so they would get really unclean fast. This one let's the water flow through really well, and I got the clear, see-through mat that blends in and I can see if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a really long bath mat, this is it
customer_reviews.text: The color is super cute (turquoise). But the real hero of the story is the fact that it is actually the length they advertise. The mat takes up the whole bottom of the tub which is great because it means I won't fall and injure myself. I've purchased a few other "extra long" mats here and had to throw them away because the size wasn't accurate. This one is. It did have a slight plastic smell, which I wasn't crazy about and which I believe they said it didn't have so that wasn't ideal. Otherwise, I'd probably buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Doesn’t budge. Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I have your very common and average bath that you find in most homes. I love this bc it’s a little longer than most others, so it covers more of the tub without being too long. It stays in place. I have used it for a couple months so far and this thing hasn’t budged with us only having one bathroom, two toddlers bathing in it and two adults. Every other mat that I have ever used would slide around at some point but not this one. It looks exactly as pictured. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beloved43

customer_reviews.title: All but for the smell...
customer_reviews.text: I really did like the length, quality, and color of this bath mat. However I was disappointed with the chemical odor others had complained about. We tried airing it outside for a couple of days and hoped that it would fade with several baths. Unfortunately it did not. (The smell even transferred to a washcloth that was hung over it on the drying rack.) Ultimately I had to return it because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Wife-Mom-Teacher...tired

customer_reviews.title: Product is high quality and works but beware of STRONG chemical smells.
customer_reviews.text: The products does what it is suppose to. I hang it up on the handle of my shower door when done so don’t think it will ever mildew and it looks as new as the day I started using it. However the chemical smell still have not fully dissipated yet and it’s been weeks. The first 2 weeks the chemical smell was the worst. I had to open a window or I would get a huge headache. Almost returned the product but somehow toughed it out and the smell is starting to go away. So even though the product works it’s not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ming

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This Tike Smart Bathtub Mat is truly non-slip. The color is beautiful and adds to my shower decor. Feels good on my feet and I enjoy standing and walking on it. After showering I rinse it off and hang it to dry. It is machine washable. I contacted the seller about washing instructions and they answered me promptly. They suggested to wash it with your towels, regular detergent but not bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel H.

customer_reviews.title: The thing stinks really bad
customer_reviews.text: The bath mat works fine for us. We're using it for baby bath time so she doesn't slip in the tub while we're washing her. But man this thing freaking smells. I thought my septic was backing up or something because my bathroom smelled so bad. I letting the thing air outside for a couple days. I don't know why they smell so bad. The factory where they make this things must smell awful!
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Just like others said there was a slight plastic odor which is expected! I just washed it off before placing it in the tub and I can’t smell it anymore. It works great in my bathtub and I love how long it is. I don’t have to worry about my daughter slipping when she’s at different ends of the tub playing with her toys. I got the turquoise color and it’s super cute!! It definitely adds a pop of color to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Mold resistant
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands of tub mats, but will only purchase Tike Smart now. They are pliable and go in the tub easily, and come up to clean the tub, but have superior suction. I've used Tike brand for 3 years and would not consider any other brand. Never had mold, they also stay soft yet are very slip resistant, which is important as my husband has neuropathy in his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Charta F

customer_reviews.title: Only good for certain tubs
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t suction to bath tub floor unless the flooring is smooth. Our tub has a little bit of a texture to it and this mat just slides around. Not safe for my son
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Very hard plastic, hurts the feet
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this at all. It looks fine but the bumps are smaller than my previous one and are very hard on the feet. Wish I could still return, do not recommend. Ended up buying a better one for the same price from Bed, Bath & Beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. We've had it for almost a year and it still suctions great and rolls up easily for storage. We've forgot to rinse it off and water has sat on it before and it hasn't grown mold like out other ones. It has a little slot so water can go into the drain and that is brilliant. The other ones I've tried have covered up the hole and make it drain slow.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bath mat I have ever purchased!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 100 disabled and have mobility issues. I have to climb into a high tub and need the security of when I step in I won't slip. I really like this mat, it not oly look good and go with my color scheme. It is comfortable and stays put. Very good product and I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Bevy

customer_reviews.title: Ideal bath mat
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Does everything it promises and serves its purpose with 0 issues. Pros: - Does a good job of preventing slipping in the shower - Comfortable to stand on - Sticks firmly to the bottom of the bathtub, but easy to remove - Truly machine washable--we throw in with our towels and shower curtain once a week and it comes out clean without damaging the rest of the laundry. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: LBao

customer_reviews.title: Better than the baby bath mats that mold
customer_reviews.text: Still no mold, thank god. I had been buying the soft baby bath mats but within a week we had mold, and that’s with cleaning regularly and hanging to dry. I thought this would be a good try since my little ones take baths every night. Suction is excellent, I just throw it down as I’m filling the tube and use my feet to suction it down. Doesn’t get slippery or slimy at all, and it fits the whole bottom of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Clean but Nice and Long
customer_reviews.text: So they have extreme suction BUT it’s incredibly hard to clean by hand. I’m at the point of using my hose from outside to clean it lol. The suction part is where it’s hard to clean at. But it is a very long mat (who h is awesome) and I like the black color. Even though it’s extremely hard to clean I’ve purchased 3 already lol. 1 in one order and 2 recently.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing quality! Nice "thick" plastic with quality suction cups. We were a little worried about the size (measured that it might be a bit wide), but its a perfect fir in our bathtub. The green color is a little more Bright green than the photo looks, but is perfect for our pineapple tropical kids bathroom. Contacted seller with a question and got a prompt complete response. Grateful to do business with such a great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very good length for safety
customer_reviews.text: Bathtub mat use. Much better than the short ones that can be a problem of stepping off of back or forward and slipping. Although heavier to take-up or out and clean ...worth the extra effort for daily safety. Actually...get your younger relatives to help with the lifting. Better than finding you smashed in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Colorful Bathmat!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bathmat, my daughter loves the color! It sticks very well to the floor of the tub. We have been using it for over a month with no problems. The only Con: the bathmat has a very strong chemical smell. It makes the whole shower/bath stall have the chemical smell of the mat. That is the only reason I gave it four stars and not all five. Disclosure: this is an honest review by a critical Medic. I was not given any kickback to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: MedicChris83

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. I received this product today and very disappointed in this. Is not what was described to me. Very small and the color is purple not blue. Amazon needs to send this junk back to China. I will be returning this. Again not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Claunch

customer_reviews.title: Good suction, but not as easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Suction is awesome. Doesn't clean as well as I thought. I put it in the washer in hopes it would clean the black stuff off the mat, but it doesn't...maybe if bleach were put in the washer with the mat it would take the black stuff off...this is black gunk from 1 month of non-washing. Other than that the mat works great for non-skid/slip.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect length and keeps my 15 month old from slipping ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this because of the odor other reviewers complained about. There IS a strong plastic smell, but it's nothing a few hours outside can't get rid of. It suctions perfectly to our slightly textured bathtub and after bath time I pull it up and stick it to the shower wall to dry out. It's been several months now and we haven't seen evidence of mildew or mold. It's the perfect length and keeps my 15 month old from slipping and sliding all over the place. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This bath mat arrived a day early and is exactly what I needed. Being on blood thinners one of my fears is falling in the shower. This mat prevents that, looks great and does exactly as it is advertised. And yeah I got the bright yellow one lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a mat that doesn’t squish down and spread out as you step on it. This is really important to me because I’m heavier and I feel like I’m falling if it doesn’t suction down properly. It fits my whole tub which I like because my old mat only fit about 2/3 of the tub. I’m comfortable that my child will have an easier time standing because it fits almost the entire bottom of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Emzizme

customer_reviews.title: Measure!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and study mat. Please don't make the mistake I did though. Measure your tub. This is for more like a large garden tub. It's too long for mine, but I still use it up the back side some for now. I'm going to have to try to trim it. It's a great product though and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and confortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive nice mat but can't be used in a tub with a textured bottom. I ended up using it in my soaking tub and enjoy the textured feel. It did have a slight smell at first but that has disappeared. Can roll up to store but need a wide enough vanity cabinet or linen closet as it is long. Ihaven't had it long enough to personally know how easy it will be to clean
customer_reviews.author: Sharmcg

customer_reviews.title: great, safe, mat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this non slip mat. It makes me feel very secure. I also take baths and found out that this is not what you want in the bottom of the tub when you take a bath, lol. So when I take a bath, I just pull it up and stick it to the side of the shower wall until I'm done and then I put it back down. I highly recommend this mat for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: I have a one year old who wont stay still in the bath, and this mat is perfect for us. I have a standard sized tub, and it fits almost the entire length. It stays in place well, but is easy to remove for cleaning. It has a strong plasticity scent when taking out of the package, but it went away after a few days. I would totally recommend this to people with small kids who try to stand in the tub!
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: My wife mentioned that we should get something to help with bath time with our squirmy little baby boy, so I found this on Amazon and ordered one right away. Let me say, this thing really helps! Now instead of slipping and sliding all over, our little guy can safely control himself much better while exploring the tub. Awesome product, great price. Thank you very much! Great product for new parents!
customer_reviews.author: T. Green

customer_reviews.title: Love it, other than the rubbery smell
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and does all I need it to, but my bathroom smells like rubber. Even after months, there are days I walk in and get hit with the rubber smell. I use it for my one year old so he doesn’t slip, and it works great for that. It’s easy to clean and doesn’t cause mold buildup and also looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Machine Washable!  Comes out sooo clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how it covers the entire bottom of the tub! This is the second one I purchased because I was so happy with the first one. To clean it, I have been placing it in the wash cycle and it is still as strong as ever. The suctions cups are quality you can feel on your feet as they stick very well in place.
customer_reviews.author: B² Gary

customer_reviews.title: Safe and forgiving of lightly textured tub bottoms....
customer_reviews.text: Even with a lightly texturized bathtub bottom, it holds it's place. Could save my life; I've nearly slipped while showering several times before getting this. Good length and width for a "normal" tub (the kind apartments usually have). Note: If primarily used while showering, wash before taking an actual bath because hair and soap scum accumulate underneath. I clean it with a aerosol-type cleaner and rinse both sides right there in the tub. I don't see a need for cleaning it in a washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: VA Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this mat is machine washable. It is lightweight and attractive. It fit securely on the smooth surface of my bathtub.It is comfortable to stand on. In these days of covid-19 instead of putting water on your hands to transfer to the mat as according to the instructions I saturated the suction cups with water from a spray bottle.It worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lambo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, easy to clean, and cute color!
customer_reviews.text: This mat definitely does what it is supposed to, which is suction to the tub and provide non-slip material for safety. However, it isn’t the most comfortable to sit on in a longer bath, but that may just be my sensitive skin! Overall, I’d buy it again and the suction power is great, easy to pick up and rinse clean then re suction. Keeps my 10 month old from slipping, so it definitely works! The cute color is also a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: MHM

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, especially for kids bath
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I’ve gone through so many bath mats and this one is hands down the best. The suction really holds. I’ve tried Walmart, Target, etc. and none compare to this one. Now bath time is less stressful because I know that my kids won’t slip. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath mat! Our 13 month old had outgrown his "little tub" but the regular tub was just too slick. This mat fixed our issue! It goes the length of the tub, sticks well, and our little guy can play (supervised of course) without sliding all over. It's very easy to clean and we've had no soap scum or mildew issues. Definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mm622

customer_reviews.title: Item Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tub mat...it is the perfect size for my smallish, older style tub. The color is perfect and the suction is amazing so it feels very secure. I decided to take a chance on a lower priced tub mat and am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works well but smells bad
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son to transition out of an infant tub and it sticks, which is nice and it'll be easy to wipe down to clean. However, it stinks. We have a small bathroom and the plastic smell was almost skunky. Will probably fade with more use, but an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, very efficient
customer_reviews.text: I originally brought it for my baby since he outgrown the baby tub and I loved it, very easy to clean I have not had a problem. I wanted to used for a month before writing a review. So far I haven't had any problem or injuries with my baby and I am very happy with this mat! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: AJ Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great little mat
customer_reviews.text: I loved this purchase. It is a bit smaller than I would have preferred but it covers a good area. For safety sake, as with many other mats, I wet the tub a little so that the grips will hold. Great color and adds to the beauty of my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BDC

customer_reviews.title: Smells like SKUNK!
customer_reviews.text: I can't get the skunk smell out of this. It truly smells so much like it's been sprayed by a skunk that I'm wondering if it had an accident of some sort?! Tried airing it out outside and it did reduce the stink but I still woke up to the smell of skunk in the house. Going in garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and it functions like it’s supposed to but it has a massive chemical smell. I put it through the wash twice when it arrived. Then soaked it in all purpose Lysol in the tub for half a day. The smell is so strong i can smell it from the hallway. I wanted something for my high strung 6 yr old so he doesn’t slip. Guess I’ll have to keep looking
customer_reviews.author: bettina Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!!
customer_reviews.text: It covers the whole bathtub (regular size). Just clean the bathtub before placing the mat and push it to stick it on place. Be careful the first time you step on it, since some suctions cups may not be fully attached yet. It can be clean with Clorox ( won’t lose its color)
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My old porcelain tub looks great and no more slipping
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. I have an old porcelain tub which is very slippery. I love the color how it cast onto the tub. We just turn the shower on then lay it down and step on it. After each use we attach it to the tub surround so it can air dry and it is right there ready to go. Really nice surface for those tub soaks too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your Experience Could Be Different
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I liked about this was that I could return it. It was uncomfortable on my feet and it had a chemical ordor.
customer_reviews.author: GmaDar

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an old house and my tub leans a bit. With this tub mat, I feel much safer than standing on the tub alone. I have also used other mats which just don't stick well or they bunch up. This mat is awesome and has stayed in place with every shower.
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Better than slipping in the shower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my bathtub is very slippery. The mat was very easy to affix to my tub and I like that it's clear. It doesn't have quite as much friction as I would have liked, but it's definitely a huge improvement over my slippery tub. The mat stays in place. My only real disappointment is that dirt/hair get stuck underneath the mat, so it does require regular cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: pinkliggloss

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install and its very easy to clean/maintain. The color was vibrant and it added color to the tub which my toddler loved lol. Along with her bath toys she has fun identifying all the different colors while taking a bath. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Remember to pull it back every once in a while to detail clean your tub otherwise dirt with leave stains on the ceramic around the rings. Non slip function is good as well. Slightly uncomfortable when taking a bath but its rare enough that its no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon cheek

customer_reviews.title: Just makes the cut!
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year recently out grew her inflatable rubber ducky tub. I tried another toddler tub option but she didn't like it. I was skeptical about putting her in a full tub and was having a hard time finding a tub mat that would cover the entire bottom. The extra-long version just made the cut. It is a little short of the drain (reason for 4 stars) but covers enough of the bath for her to be comfortable. The suction power is great, I do not have a textured tub. I just rinse after each bath, use the suction to stick to the wall to hang dry, roll it up and bring it out for her next tub time.
customer_reviews.author: CPJ

customer_reviews.title: The Tike Smart Extra-Long Non -Slip Bath Mat is by far the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Tike Smart Extra-Long Non -Slip Bath Mat is by far the best bath mat I've have the pleasure to purchase. It was tried and tested by a active 3 year old. This awesome bath mat has been approved by both child (and ) adults. I will purchase an additional one maybe two of these Time Smart Bath Mat based solely on how well this one works !!!
customer_reviews.author: KaMar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research before ordering this mat. I have read the reviews, and there was not one hint of a smell from the rubber. NO BAD SCENT AT ALL. Suctions super well, and the color blue is beautiful. Such a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bathmat
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this mat several times for myself and several friends. It's the best bathmat we've found. It's durable, non-slip and covers the majority of the bathtub. It's comfortable whether soaking in the tub or taking a shower. This bathmat is a 'plus' in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Moonman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip and slip-prevention
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 8 month old who before was sliding all over the place in the tub. This pad has suction cups that give a good hold but still allows flow for dirt to not get trapped underneath. Cleans so easy we don't both removing when the adults shower and also provides extra slip proof protection for me and my wife. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hoesing

customer_reviews.title: Great but smelly
customer_reviews.text: Great size and colour. Seems to stick well to our bath. I thought the bumpy floor would be annoying but it’s not really a bother. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is it SMELLS. Our whole apartment reeks of heavy chemical/plastic smell... hoping it goes away with use.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the fact that it covers the whole tub n my granddaughter absolutely loves that its comfortable as she is autistic n has many sensory issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Strong Suction You Won't Slip.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any dislikes for this mat. I use it for my bathtub and I don't worry about slipping because the suction is very strong. It is easy to clean and the pink is like a hot pink. My tub is white so it looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: This had an awful smell to it like chemicals, and doesn’t even stay put in our tub. When I first put it in the tub. Yo husband walked in and asked why it smelled like marijuana. We filled the tub with water hoping it needed wetness to stick and it just floats around.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my purchase!! Suction cups are strong and the mat does not slide at all. You have to make sure your bathtub is not textured. The size is amazing and it fits perfectly. I've removed it a few times already to clean and the suctions are still strong. Best investment and totally worth the price!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Smells/does not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days and many showers this still reeks of a gross plastic/chemical odor AND it does NOT suction to the tub at all. Moves all over.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Winsler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: This fits so perfect, it covers the entire bottom of the bathtub. I love the color and it goes perfect in my beach theme bathroom. The bathtub is really old so I needed something to cover the bottom so you couldn’t tell. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clean and suction works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mat I purchased for my little one and it is SO MUCH better. It doesn't mildew like my other one did and it is easy to keep suctioned to the floor of the tub. The old one I hated to peel off and clean because it took forever to get it back down - this one I can just lay on the tub floor, lightly press down and it sticks super easy. I got the longer size and it fits perfect in my standard tub. I love how it has a cut out for the drain so I get extra coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Waser

customer_reviews.title: beaware of the Rubber smell and light stain
customer_reviews.text: This bathtub Mat did its job. It does attach well to smooth bathtub surface and makes it non-slip. There are couple things to be aware of however. One, it does have that industrial plastic / rubber smell that may bother people with sensitive nose. I would suggest washing it first before using. Another issue is it left color bleed on my brand new bathtub. Its faint in color so its not an eye sore per se but it did mar my tub so be careful when choosing color. Functionality wise, it did its job and I would give it 4 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye22

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so when I take the twins a bath I could have both in the tub at the same time without fear of them slipping. They is great and long enough. The price is excellent, product quality is also excellent. Definitely will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: LILLIAN ORTIZ-ROSA

customer_reviews.title: Not a non-slip mat.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is slick when wet, which will not work for us. It also has a very strong smell that has lingered for over a week after being aired out. I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 because I like the length and I like that it has holes throughout to allow it to dry better.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: stays put
customer_reviews.text: There are a ton of these mats being sold by dozens of companies and they all are the same. Just find the right color and price. They stick well. Easy to clean on top but not so much underneath. It is easier just to buy a new one than to try cleaning the underside.
customer_reviews.author: S. Price

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product stays in place and provides a slip free tub. I ordered the blue/purple color. It is cute, however I mainly chose it bc I thought the clear would prob end up looking dingy. So far no dinginess and works well. I have a 6 month old and want to make sure bath time is safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for those of you looking for a mat that spans the width and length of a tub. The other mats just covered about half the tub and weren't enough for my highly mobile 1 year old who crawls all over the tub during bathtime. We just peel the mat off when her bath is over and stick it to the side of the shower wall so it's out of the way for my showers.
customer_reviews.author: John Van Name

customer_reviews.title: I bought the clear one.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for, fits the whole bath tub bottom and works like a charm, no more slipping and grabbing the hand grip! You do need to place it into a wet bath tub for it to grip but that is no trouble. Would recommend it to correct a slippy bath tub.
customer_reviews.author: lv2scooter

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good
customer_reviews.text: The extra-long bath mat seems very stable and safe. I was concerned because is not 100% smooth. It has a small etched design in it. Hanging on to my handrails I tried to make it slide, but it didn’t. The only reason why I didn’t give an overall 5 star rating is because I don’t know how it will hold up over time. Worked well for years until it slipped and I feel. With the bath mat being extra long and the multiple suction cups, I think those features provide a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Carl D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars minus 2
customer_reviews.text: Best bath mat EVER! 3/20/2016 update...I still really like the functional aspects of this bath mat, but when I used some bleach in my tub today it caused the clear vinyl to turn peachy yellow color! So disappointed! It still works well, but looks awful! Info in the description says it can be machine washed, I guess I'll try that, but don't have much hope. Taking away a few stars. Doesn't say (anywhere that I can find) that you can't use bleach. If it looks better after machine washing, I'll give back one star!
customer_reviews.author: Katy IM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little one who was transitioning from her infant tub to the big girl tub. Arrived super fast and works like a charm, fits bath perfectly. I have only had it for about a month have cleaned it twice already, Has held up nicely. My little one is the only one who uses the shower so no ones really stepping or moving the mat as of now the suction is great and hasn't moved. She's stood up in the tub numerous times and hasn't slipped. Definitely recommend this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: STINKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so strongly of latex, I can’t use it. I’ve aired it out for 4 days and it’s still unusable.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLB3

customer_reviews.title: Great product and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing about this product that I'm not so happy with is that we've only had it for maybe a couple of weeks and it's already stained yellow for some reason. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live this bathmat. My toddler takes baths in our big tub and this mat has been awesome. It cleans so easily. The holes allow for draining and the suction is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Imara219

customer_reviews.title: Prevents water from draining properly - tub gets dirty
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this mat is that it has little holes in it, so the shower water goes through the holes gets trapped underneath the mat but then doesn't get a chance to drain. Then the tub dries and the entire area under the mat is dirty because the water got trapped and did not drain. I have to clean my tub much more often then when I had no mat. I will be throwing this product away and buying a matt that is just a solid mat with no built in holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: Suction did not work, kept sliding around the shower. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Deloge

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I tested it real quick before putting it into storage for when I get my own place. I am very pleased with the purchase. My son is very active and playful when he takes his baths and this held up perfectly for him.
customer_reviews.author: mikayla liley

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was that it had this rubber smell that didn’t go away for about a month after scrubbing it several time. It would fill my bathroom with that bad smell :(. But the suction bottom part works .
customer_reviews.author: nury

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It smelled weird when I first installed it, but the smell is either fading or my nose adjusted. Lol. Either way, it looks pretty and works fantastic. I'd buy it again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. I like to keep 2 for swapping out between cleaning. The first one hasn't mildewed or stained nor torn. The mat holds in place. Would say the only negative could be that it may need a bit more cushioning underfoot.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.N.

product_meta.title: Tike Smart Extra-Long Non-Slip Bathtub & Shower Mat 39”x16” (Smooth/Non-textured Tubs Only) Safe,Clean,Anti-bacterial,Machine-washable,Superior Grip&Drainage, Vinyl, Transparent Light Blue
product_meta.description: Size:Twin XL| Color:Transparent Light BlueNote: For smooth (non-textured) tub floors only. Give yourself the peace of mind that comes from being safe and protected by this Premium Quality Extra Long Non-Slip PVC Bath Mat. Generous 39x16-inch size covers the entire floor of your tub, with 33% more coverage than the average bathmat, for complete slip-resistant protection from slips and falls. Excellent safety and stability, with 200 powerful suction cups that attach firmly to any non-textured tub or shower floor. Perfect grip & traction, with a no slip textured surface and 174 drainage holes that allow water to drain away safely, leaving your feet planted securely on this superior bathtub mat. BPA free, phthalate free, allergen free vinyl. Ultra-clean -- machine-washable and anti bacterial (anti microbial) for complete mold and mildew resistance. Great for kids, children and the elderly and disabled, as well as general use. With heavy-duty, high-quality vinyl material, at 1.75 lbs, this no-slip bath mat is stronger than a rubber bathtub mat, cleaner than a bath rug and a better value than other bath tub mats. Lifetime guaranteed with a No-Questions-Asked lifetime return policy. By Tike Smart.
feature_bullets: FOR SMOOTH BATHTUB/SHOWER FLOORS ONLY - NOT FOR TEXTURED SURFACES. Safety first: The best extra-long slip-resistant bathtub mat - will keep you, your children, the elderly and disabled safe when bathing/showering. 200 powerful suction cups - will not slip when used on non-textured shower or tub surface. 39”x16", fits standard tub, covers the whole tub floor, with 33% more coverage than the average mat, for added anti-slip protection from slip and fall accidents. Textured surface - superior grip.

CLEAN: The cleanest bathtub mat available, anti-bacterial (anti-microbial) and machine washable for years of safe, healthy, worry-free use with no mold or mildew. 174 drainage holes keep water flowing through the bath mat.

BEST MATERIALS: Highest quality phthalate-free, BPA-free allergen-free vinyl. Heavy duty, weighing in at 1.75 lbs., it lays flat and won’t slip on the tub or shower floor. Curl-free packaging makes this extra long bath mat easy to use starting day 1.

COMFORT: Cushioned and comfortable, like a massage for your feet. You, your kids, your parents and the elderly or disabled will feel not only safe but revitalized while bathing or showering with the most comfortable extra long bathtub/shower mat there is!
GUARANTEED: We back our products 100% for life, and you are free to return this product at any time with no questions asked!
